Operation 'GetTemplateVersion' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original description is minimal and lacks actionable details. Added clarity about required parameters (template_id, version_id), what is returned (complete version object with specific fields), and authentication requirement. data.current_summary: Retrieve a specific transactional template version.
data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific version of a template.**
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific transactional template version
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific version of a transactional template by template ID and version ID. Returns the complete template version object including content, metadata, editor type, and generation information. Requires authentication via API key.
data.reasoning: Original description is minimal and lacks actionable details. Added clarity about required parameters (template_id, version_id), what is returned (complete version object with specific fields), and authentication requirement. This helps AI agents understand the operation's inputs, outputs, and prerequisites.

message: Operation 'UpdateTemplateVersion' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description is too vague about what can be edited and what happens after the update. Enhanced description clarifies that partial updates are supported, specifies editable fields, explains the return value, and importantly notes that updates don't auto-activate versions. This is critical context for AI agents to understand the operation's side effects and limitations.

data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to edit the content of your template version.**
data.description_suggestion: Updates the content and properties of a specific transactional template version. Accepts partial updates to fields such as subject, html_content, plain_text, and metadata. Returns the updated template version object. Note: Updating a version does not automatically activate it; you must explicitly activate the version if you want it to be used for sending.
data.reasoning: Original description is too vague about what can be edited and what happens after the update. Enhanced description clarifies that partial updates are supported, specifies editable fields, explains the return value, and importantly notes that updates don't auto-activate versions. This is critical context for AI agents to understand the operation's side effects and limitations.

message: Operation 'DeleteTemplateVersion' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, missing_context. Original description lacks critical side effect information. Enhanced description clarifies that deletion is permanent, explains the consequence of deleting an active version, specifies the response code, and includes authentication requirement. AI agents need this information to understand the destructive nature of the operation and its potential impact on email sending.

data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to delete a transactional template version.**
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a specific version of a transactional template. The deletion is irreversible. If the deleted version is currently active, no version will be active for that template until another version is explicitly activated. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion. Requires authentication via API key.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical side effect information. Enhanced description clarifies that deletion is permanent, explains the consequence of deleting an active version, specifies the response code, and includes authentication requirement. AI agents need this information to understand the destructive nature of the operation and its potential impact on email sending.

message: Operation 'ActivateTemplateVersion' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, missing_context. Original description lacks important operational context about the activation mechanism. Enhanced description clarifies that activation makes a version the default for sends, explains the mutual exclusivity constraint (only one active version per template), and notes the side effect of deactivating the previous version. This is essential for AI agents to understand the operation's impact on the template system's state.

data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to activate a version of one of your templates.**
data.description_suggestion: Activates a specific version of a transactional template, making it the active version used for all subsequent email sends using that template ID. Only one version can be active per template at a time; activating a new version automatically deactivates the previously active version. Returns the activated template version object. Requires authentication via API key.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks important operational context about the activation mechanism. Enhanced description clarifies that activation makes a version the default for sends, explains the mutual exclusivity constraint (only one active version per template), and notes the side effect of deactivating the previous version. This is essential for AI agents to understand the operation's impact on the template system's state.

message: Operation 'CreateTemplate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description is minimal and lacks critical details. Added information about template purpose, input requirements (template name), output (template ID), account limits, and access restrictions to help AI agents understand when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to create a transactional template.**
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new transactional template for your account. The template serves as a reusable container for email content that can have multiple versions. Requires a template name in the request body. Returns the created template object with a unique template ID that can be used in subsequent API calls. Each account can create up to 300 templates. Templates are account-specific and not accessible to Subusers.
data.reasoning: Original description is minimal and lacks critical details. Added information about template purpose, input requirements (template name), output (template ID), account limits, and access restrictions to help AI agents understand when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'ListTemplate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description doesn't mention pagination parameters or return structure. Enhanced to clarify pagination support, filtering capabilities, and what template metadata is returned to improve AI agent decision-making about result handling.

data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve all transactional templates.**
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all transactional templates for your account. Supports filtering and pagination parameters to control the results returned. Returns an array of template objects with metadata including template IDs, names, creation dates, and version information. Useful for discovering available templates or managing template inventory.
data.reasoning: Original description doesn't mention pagination parameters or return structure. Enhanced to clarify pagination support, filtering capabilities, and what template metadata is returned to improve AI agent decision-making about result handling.

message: Operation 'DuplicateTemplate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks specifics about what gets duplicated (versions included), input requirements, and output. Added clarity about duplication scope, use cases, and return value to help AI agents understand the operation's full impact.

data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to duplicate a transactional template.**
data.description_suggestion: Creates a copy of an existing transactional template, including all its versions. Requires the source template ID as a path parameter. The duplicated template receives a new unique template ID and can be customized independently. Useful for creating template variants or backing up templates before modifications. Returns the newly created template object.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks specifics about what gets duplicated (versions included), input requirements, and output. Added clarity about duplication scope, use cases, and return value to help AI agents understand the operation's full impact.

message: Operation 'GetTemplate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Original description is too minimal. Enhanced to specify what information is returned (versions, metadata, status) and provide context for when an AI agent should use this operation versus list operations.

data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a single transactional template.**
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the details of a specific transactional template by its template ID. Returns the template object including its name, creation metadata, and a list of associated versions with their status (active/inactive). Use this operation to inspect template configuration or verify template existence before performing other operations.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal. Enhanced to specify what information is returned (versions, metadata, status) and provide context for when an AI agent should use this operation versus list operations.

message: Operation 'UpdateTemplate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary says 'Edit' which is ambiguous about scope. Enhanced summary to clarify it's metadata-only. Description now explicitly states what can be updated (name only), what cannot be updated (content), and directs to the correct operation for content changes, preventing AI agent confusion.

data.current_description:
**This endpoint allows you to edit the name of a transactional template.**

To edit the template itself, [create a new transactional template version](https://docs.sendgrid.com/api-reference/transactional-templates-versions/create-a-new-transactional-template-version).
data.description_suggestion: Updates the metadata of an existing transactional template, specifically the template name. Requires the template ID as a path parameter and the new name in the request body. Returns the updated template object. Note: To modify template content (HTML, subject, etc.), create a new template version instead. This operation only affects template properties, not its versions or content.
data.reasoning: Original summary says 'Edit' which is ambiguous about scope. Enhanced summary to clarify it's metadata-only. Description now explicitly states what can be updated (name only), what cannot be updated (content), and directs to the correct operation for content changes, preventing AI agent confusion.

message: Operation 'DeleteTemplate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks critical information about permanence, cascading deletion of versions, and side effects. Enhanced to warn about irreversibility and impact on sending operations, helping AI agents make informed decisions about when to execute this destructive operation.

data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to delete a transactional template.**
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a transactional template and all of its associated versions. Requires the template ID as a path parameter. This action cannot be undone. After deletion, the template ID cannot be used in sending API calls. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion. Ensure no active sending processes depend on this template before deletion.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical information about permanence, cascading deletion of versions, and side effects. Enhanced to warn about irreversibility and impact on sending operations, helping AI agents make informed decisions about when to execute this destructive operation.

message: Operation 'CreateTemplateVersion' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description is too generic. Enhanced to explain input requirements (template ID, version content), output (version ID), default state (inactive), and use cases (A/B testing, variations) to help AI agents understand the version management workflow.

data.current_summary: Create a new transactional template version.
data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to create a new version of a template.**
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new version of an existing transactional template. Requires the template ID as a path parameter and version details (subject, HTML content, plain text, etc.) in the request body. Returns the newly created version object with a unique version ID. New versions are created in inactive state by default. Use the activate endpoint to set a version as active for sending. Multiple versions allow A/B testing or seasonal template variations without changing the template ID.
data.reasoning: Original description is too generic. Enhanced to explain input requirements (template ID, version content), output (version ID), default state (inactive), and use cases (A/B testing, variations) to help AI agents understand the version management workflow.
